department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: naturalistic, carved figure seated cross legged with the right hand raised to the side of the face; the left resting on the left knee; circular cavity in the belly, another in head; oval head with large features and ears; the whole with an extremely fine, almost black patina
medium: hard wood, fetish composition, traces of kaolin and tukula powder
title: Figure Seated Cross-Legged
